title: Week at a Glance
description: Visualize your week with a familiar, calendar-like view that makes it **easy to make plans** and update those plans as week unfolds

title: Quick Planner
description:
Keep track of tasks that are **incomplete**,
**due soon**, or were **left behind** on days where you were feeling particularly... ambitious

title: Prioritization
description:
An adaptation of the Eisenhower Matrix,
tasks are labeled important, urgent, both,
or neither so your priorities are always clear

title: Daily Review
description:
Mindfully end each day by **reviewing wins**
and deciding which **leftover tasks** should be marked as done, won't do, or rescheduled

title: Notes & Journal
description: Jot your thoughts down throughout the day in a convenient **markdown** editor or use the journal to reflect on **customizable prompts**

title: Goals
description: Organize tasks into milestones that make a meaningful difference in your life, because **being busy != being productive**

title: Focus Blocks
description: Inspired by the Pomodoro Technique, focus blocks are a great way to **get in the zone**, especially for those of us with ADHD

title: Habit Tracking
description: Form new habits or kick old ones with a **convenient** habit tracker you'll actually remember to use ( or at least see )
